biography: Marina Hedman Bellis (September 29, 1944 in Göteborg, Sweden) is a retired Swedish pornographic and mainstream actress. Hedman, who had been a well-known model, arrived in Italy as wife of an Italian journalist, Paolo Frajese, who in 1965 had gone to Sweden for a number of television reports.In 1976 she made her film debut with a small uncredited role in Lucio Fulci's sex comedy La pretora (My Sister In Law), starring Edwige Fenech. Throughout the late 1970s and early 1980s, Hedman had supporting roles in mainstream films. She appeared in her last film in the early 90s.
name: Marina Hedman
